comics.title: The Mighty Thor
comics.description: The final battle between Thor and the Mangog!

comics.title: Captain America
comics.description: Cap faces a new enemy who seeks to rewrite history!

comics.title: The Uncanny Avengers
comics.description: A new team of Avengers is formed to take on a deadly threat!

comics.title: Incredible Hulk
comics.description: The first appearance of Wolverine as he goes up against the Incredible Hulk!

comics.title: Action Comics
comics.description: The first appearance of Superman as he takes on corrupt politicians and criminals in Metropolis!

comics.title: Batman: The Killing Joke
comics.description: The Joker tries to prove that anyone can be driven insane like he was, with Batman and Commissioner Gordon caught in the crossfire!

comics.title: Deadpool: Merc with a Mouth
comics.description: Deadpool travels to different dimensions to collect the pieces of a powerful weapon, but he's not the only one after it.

comics.title: Ghost Rider: Road to Damnation
comics.description: Johnny Blaze (aka Ghost Rider) makes a deal with the devil to save his mentor's soul, but he must pay the price by collecting escaped demons.

comics.title: Wonder Woman: The True Amazon
comics.description: This graphic novel retells the origin story of Wonder Woman, exploring her Amazonian heritage and the challenges she faced on her path to becoming a hero.

comics.title: Ms. Marvel: No Normal
comics.description: Kamala Khan, a teenage girl from New Jersey, discovers she has the power to shapeshift and embarks on a journey of self-discovery and heroism.

comics.title: Saga: Volume 1
comics.description: This space opera follows two lovers from warring alien races as they fight to keep their family together and survive in a universe filled with danger.

comics.title: Watchmen
comics.description: In an alternate version of 1985, a group of retired superheroes investigate the murder of one of their own and uncover a conspiracy that threatens the world.

comics.title: The Sandman: Preludes and Nocturnes
comics.description: Dream, the lord of dreams, is imprisoned for 70 years and must recover his lost artifacts to regain his power and seek revenge against his captors.

comics.title: Hellboy: Seed of Destruction
comics.description: A demon baby rescued by the Allies during World War II grows up to become a paranormal investigator, battling supernatural threats and unraveling his own mysterious origins.

comics.title: The Mighty Avengers
comics.description: When Earth is threatened by powerful villains, the Avengers assemble to save the day. Join Iron Man, Thor, Hulk, Black Widow, and other heroes in this action-packed adventure.

comics.title: Green Lantern: Rebirth
comics.description: Hal Jordan is back as the Green Lantern, but can he overcome his past mistakes and redeem himself as a hero? Find out in this thrilling comic book series.

comics.title: The Flash: Rebirth
comics.description: Barry Allen is back as The Flash, but his world has changed. Can he regain his powers and restore the timeline to its rightful place? Follow his journey in this exciting comic book.

comics.title: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Avengers
comics.description: When the fate of the universe is at stake, the Guardians of the Galaxy step up to save it. Join Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and Groot in this epic adventure.

comics.title: FlashPoint Beyond
comics.description: On the eve of Aquaman's sinking of London, Batman infiltrates his stronghold and goes on the warpath for answers. Nothing matters to Batman, whose world is already dead, but if he can track down the Clockwork Killer, Thomas can save his son's world and put everything back together again.

comics.title: Agatha Coven of CHAOS
comics.description: On the eve of Aquaman's sinking of London, Batman infiltrates his stronghold and goes on the warpath for answers. Nothing matters to Batman, whose world is already dead, but if he can track down the Clockwork Killer, Thomas can save his son's world and put everything back together again.
